meanings.definition: A type of French seafood stew.
meanings.sent1: The bouillabaisses at the restaurant smelled delicious.
meanings.sent2: She ordered two bouillabaisses for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally spilled bouillabaisses on his apron.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of bouillabaisses filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The colorful bouillabaisses simmered in the pot.

meanings.sent1: The menu listed various bouillabaisses for the guests.
meanings.sent2: They enjoyed the different bouillabaisses at the party.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled when they heard the word bouillabaisses.
meanings.sent4: The market displayed a variety of bouillabaisses.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the bouillabaisses wafted through the room.
